data.title: Best Movies Like Desperate Teenage Lovedolls
meta_keywords: movies similar to Desperate Teenage Lovedolls
data.meta_description: Movies Similar to Desperate Teenage Lovedolls: Lovedolls Superstar (1986), Down and Out with the Dolls (2001), What We Do Is Secret (2007), Rock 'n' Roll High School (1979), 2gether (2000), Eternity: The Movie (2014), Tapeheads (1988), Grace of My Heart (1996), Vinyl (2012), Blast-Off Girls (1967)
data.text:
Genre: Comedy, Drama, Music

Country: USA

Duration: 50 min.

Story: Two girls rediscover their love for playing rock, find a drummer and begin practicing. When one of their mothers intervenes, they run away from home and are forced to fend for themselves on the streets against gangs and rival bands. Soon they are discovered and taken under the wing of rock manager Johnny Tremaine (played by Steven McDonald) who uses them for sex and his own aspirations of wealth. The Love Dolls set out to get revenge on those who have wronged them, and rise to the top of the rock world.
